perturbation.original_text: 2.2. Compliance With Laws. The Licensee agrees that the business operated by it in connection with the Licensed Mark shall comply with all laws, rules, regulations and requirements of any governmental body in the Territory or elsewhere as may be applicable to the operation, advertising, and promotion of the business and that it shall notify the Licensor of any action that must be taken by the Licensee to comply with such law, rules, regulations or requirements.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.9. Headings. The descriptive headings contained in this Agreement are for convenience of reference only and shall not affect in any way the meaning or interpretation of this Agreement. 2.2. Compliance With Laws. The Licensee agrees that the business operated by it in connection with the Licensed Mark shall comply with all laws, rules, regulations and requirements of any governmental body in the Territory or elsewhere as may be applicable to the operation, advertising, and promotion of the business and that it shall notify the Licensor of any action that must be taken by the Licensee to comply with such law, rules, regulations or requirements.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the 'Compliance With Laws' clause to the 'Headings' section buries a crucial legal obligation within a section typically concerned with document formatting. This makes it less likely to be noticed and adhered to, reducing its enforceability. The heading section wouldn't typically be reviewed for operational obligations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and conspicuous placement of material terms, and specific industry regulations regarding legal compliance.

perturbation.original_text: 3.1. Disclaimer of Representation and Warranties. The Licensee hereby accepts this license on an "as is" basis. The Licensee acknowledges that the Licensor makes no explicit or implicit representation or warranty as to the registrability, validity, enforceability or ownership of the Licensed Mark, or as to the Licensee's ability to use the Licensed Mark without infringing or otherwise violating the rights of others, and the Licensor has no obligation 2 Source: NMF SLF I, INC., 10-12G/A, 1/15/2020 to indemnify the Licensee with respect to any claims arising from the Licensee's use of the Licensed Mark, including without limitation any Third Party Claim.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.10. Counterparts. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, each of which when executed shall be deemed to be an original instrument and all of which taken together shall constitute one and the same agreement. 3.1. Disclaimer of Representation and Warranties. The Licensee hereby accepts this license on an "as is" basis. The Licensee acknowledges that the Licensor makes no explicit or implicit representation or warranty as to the registrability, validity, enforceability or ownership of the Licensed Mark, or as to the Licensee's ability to use the Licensed Mark without infringing or otherwise violating the rights of others, and the Licensor has no obligation 2 Source: NMF SLF I, INC., 10-12G/A, 1/15/2020 to indemnify the Licensee with respect to any claims arising from the Licensee's use of the Licensed Mark, including without limitation any Third Party Claim.
perturbation.explanation: The disclaimer clause, which normally should be reviewed closely, is moved to the 'Counterparts' section, where parties generally look for practical information about the agreement's execution rather than significant disclaimers. This reduces its visibility and thus its enforceability, as the licensee might overlook this important section of the contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and conspicuous disclaimers, especially regarding intellectual property rights.

perturbation.original_text: 4.2. Effect of Termination. Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement, all rights granted to the Licensee under this Agreement with respect to the Licensed Mark shall cease, and the Licensee shall immediately delete the term "NMF" from its corporate name and shall discontinue all other use of the Licensed Mark. For twenty-four (24) months following termination of this Agreement, the Licensee shall specify on all public- facing materials in a prominent place and in prominent typeface that the Licensee is no longer operating under the Licensed Mark, is no longer associated with the Licensor, or such other notice as may be deemed necessary by the Licensor in its sole discretion in its prosecution, defense, and/or settlement of any Third Party Claim.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.11. Entire Agreement. This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior agreements, understandings and arrangements with respect to such subject matter. 4.2. Effect of Termination. Upon expiration or termination of this Agreement, all rights granted to the Licensee under this Agreement with respect to the Licensed Mark shall cease, and the Licensee shall immediately delete the term "NMF" from its corporate name and shall discontinue all other use of the Licensed Mark. For twenty-four (24) months following termination of this Agreement, the Licensee shall specify on all public- facing materials in a prominent place and in prominent typeface that the Licensee is no longer operating under the Licensed Mark, is no longer associated with the Licensor, or such other notice as may be deemed necessary by the Licensor in its sole discretion in its prosecution, defense, and/or settlement of any Third Party Claim.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the 'Effect of Termination' clause to the 'Entire Agreement' section dilutes its importance. The Entire Agreement section is often considered boilerplate, and parties might not focus on the specific post-termination obligations outlined. This relocation makes the licensee's responsibilities after termination less prominent, potentially weakening enforcement. The licensee could claim unawareness of the detailed termination obligations.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear communication of material terms, especially regarding obligations upon termination of the agreement.
